title: Google intends to file for bankruptcy in Russia
content:
It looks like trouble is brewing in Russia, where Google is set to file for bankruptcy due to the seizure of its assets. Since the seizure, the company claims that it has been unable to pay its staff, suppliers, and vendors. It is believed that roughly 1 billion roubles or around $15 million have been

The post Google intends to file for bankruptcy in Russia appeared first on XDA.
description: Google intends to file for bankruptcy in Russia due to the seizure of its asssets following a $112 million fine from the county.
